instance.name: Human single-neuron activity during the Treasure Hunt spatial navigation task
instance.citation: Donoghue, Thomas (2023) Human single-neuron activity during the Treasure Hunt spatial navigation task (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/000468/draft
instance.description: This dataset is human single neuron dataset collected from neuro-surgical patients as they complete a virtual spatial-navigation and memory task called Treasure Hunt. This dataset includes 22 sessions from 5 subjects, collected in 2021 and 2022.
